page.title: 15CLUBS AND SOCIETIES (HARLOW)
page.content: Our area is in Harlow. There are lots of Clubs and Societies, for example:- {Childrens Clubs Brownies, Guides, Cubs, Scouts, Tap Dancing, Ballet, Riding, Judo, Karate, Swimming, Youth Club, Boys and Girls Brigade. {Adults Clubs} Whispers Disco, Badminton, Tennis, Table Tennis, Darts, Snooker, Over 60's Clubs, Bowls, Bingo, Gardening, Cricket, Football, Rugby, Netball, Model Railway {Meeting Places Schools, Recreation Centres, Churches, Harlow Museum, Community Centres, Libraries, The Town Centre, Mecca Social Club, Play Barns, Common Rooms. Harlow is a very interesting Place to live. 80% of People in Harlow belong to a club or society, many belong to more than one.
